ComicInfo.Summary:
Mega-City One counts the cost of the 'Day of Chaos' and elsewhere in the prog two new stories begin (Tharg's 3rillers and Ichabod Azrael book two - for the first time in full colour).
Cover: Simon Davis (Ichabod Azrael)
Judge Dredd - The Days After (John Wagner - Henry Flint)Durham Red - The 'Nobody Wants This Job' Job (part 5) (Alan Grant - Carlos Ezquerra)Tharg's 3rillers - 1947 (part 1) (Kek-W - Michael Dowling)The Grievous Journey of Ichabod Azrael (and the Dead left in his Wake) - Manhunt (part 1) (Rob Williams - Dom Reardon)Nikolai Dante - Sympathy for the Devil (part 4) (Robbie Morrison - Simon Fraser)
ComicInfo.Title: Sympathy for the Devil Part 04; Manhunt Part One; 1947 Part One; The 'Nobody Wants This Job' Job Part 5; The Days After
